entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -30.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
